m_szDocSumamry: Sandia researchers seek ways to make lithium-ion batteries work longer, safer Batteries could soon replace standard nickel-metal hydride batteries in hybrid vehicles DOE/Sandia National Laboratories  Print  E-Mail ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. - As part of the Department of Energy-funded FreedomCAR program, Sandia National Laboratories' Power Sources Technology Group is researching ways to make lithium-ion batteries work longer and safer.
